Have a beer from 5pm to 8pm during the week at a location, 10 times. Please note that at the time of the check-in, the app will only take the current timezone (i.e GMT Offset) into affect and other checkins in other timezones (including daylight savings time, if your location supports it) may not count toward the badge, depending on the time of that check-in. items.badge_description: It's that magical time of year full of fun, joy and of course, great beer. We wish you the best of the holiday cheer. Merry Brew-mas to all and to all a good pint.

items.badge_description: On this day in 1933, the Cullen-Harrison Act went into affect, ending prohibition. It's a good thing, otherwise we would never know the joy that is an amazingly crafted beer. Let's raise a pint in celebration!
